txt.en: It was only a hobbit playing a silly prank

Polo Puddifoot heard some very strange sounds when he was wandering through the Cobwebbed Wing in the Haunted Burrow.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Dear me! I only dared go into the Haunted Cellar once to look for treasure, but all I did was get out as fast as I could! There were monsters everywhere.

'In one of the wings I was in, there were spider-webs all about the place. But then I spotted a jar of honey! I love honey, naturally, so of course I went right for it, but then I heard a...a bear!

'It made a deep, roaring sound, and oh it was close! Will you go banish it from the burrow so that it doesn't harm any of the innocent folk who have wandered in?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Only one Haunted Burrow quest may be underway at a time.</rgb>

Somewhere in an evil-feeling part of the Haunted Burrow, an odious roar made it clear that a bear had taken up residence in the hobbit-hole, in the Cobwebbed Wing.\n\nYou should seek out the source of the roaring and drive it off so that Polo can continue his search for treasure without troublesome interruptions.

'Did you drive off the hungry bear? You were so brave to venture in there!\n\n'What?! A hobbit? A hobbit playing a prank? I've never heard of such a naughty trick! I will be speaking to that lad's parents before the day is out.'
Polo Puddifoot awaits you outside the Haunted Burrow.\n\nYou should return to Polo Puddifoot and tell him of this \qbear\q you encountered.
'There's just no explaining the things I saw in that evil place. That Bilbo Baggins was a wicked sorcerer, I believe! People should steer clear of everything associated with him.'
Find the source of the roaring in the Cobwebbed Wing and drive it off
Return to Polo Puddifoot with news of the \qbear\q
Roaring Maw in the Haunted Burrow
